name: Monkey.D.Luffy
text: On Play DON!! -1 (You may return the specified number of DON!! cards from your field to your DON!! deck): you may trash 1 Character card with a cost of 5 from your hand. This Character gains Rush during this turn. (This card can attack on the turn in which it is played.)

effect.text: You may trash 1 Character card with a cost of 5 from your hand. This Character gains Rush during this turn.

meta.notes: Rarity is C, confirmed by the 'C' in the bottom right corner of the card.
